description.en: Daanam of Dadhyodanam, Vyanjanam, Chatram, Paduka, Udaka Kumbham, Mangos, Jackfruit; Lakshmi Narayana Pooja; Gauri Pooja;

shlokas:
kanDUya pRSThatO gatvA gAM tu snAtvA pippala-tarpaNam.
kRtvA govindamabhyarcya na durgatimavApnuyAt..
chatrOpAnat pradAnaM vA gO-bhU-kAJcana-vAsasI.
yadyadiSTatamaM cAnyattaddEyam avizaGkayA..
yasyAM snAnaM japO hOmaH svAdhyAyaH pitRtarpaNam.
dAnaM ca kriyatE kiJcittatsarvaM syAdihAkSayam..
